column1: 07:42|So he really had no choice but to pay an occasional visit to the living room instead

column1: 07:42|I had been in the tech ninja sleeve only a few hours— <b>seven
column2: and forty-two minutes according to the time display chipped into my upper-left field of vision—but there were none of the usual download side effects.|Altered Carbon|Richard K. Morgan
